attributes.action: Mutual freedom of movement for citizens of UK, Canada, Australia & NZ.
attributes.additional_details:
Commonwealth Freedom of Movement initiative - http://www.cfmo.org/

Country Snapshots
Canada - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canada
Australia - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australia
NZ - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Zealand
UK - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Kingdom
attributes.background: Commonwealth realms of Canada, Australia & NZ are all highly developed economies sharing the same language and cultural values as the UK. A freedom of movement initiative between these four countries would bring enormous mutual economic, political & sociological opportunities for their citizens.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government can press the other Governments in agreeing to freedom of movement but it does not have the power to create freedom of movement on its own. You could start a petition calling on the Government to press other Commonwealth countries to accept a freedom of movement agreement, and to offer free movement to citizens from certain countries.
